verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>Command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H7971>put<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6879>leper,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> one that has an <S%H2100>issue,<s%> and <S%H3605>whoever<s%> is <S%H2931>defiled<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead:<s%>

Both <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> shall you <S%H7971>put<s%> out, <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> shall you <S%H7971>put<s%> them; that they <S%H2930>defile<s%> not their <S%H4264>camps,<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> I <S%H7931>dwell.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> and <S%H7971>put<s%> them out <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2403>sin<s%> that <S%H120>men<s%> commit, to <S%H6213>do<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and that <S%H5315>person<s%> be <S%H816>guilty;<s%>

Then they shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>done:<s%> and he shall <S%H7725>recompense<s%> his <S%H817>trespass<s%> with the <S%H7218>principal<s%> thereof, and <S%H3254>add<s%> to it the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof, and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to him against <S%H834>whom<s%> he has <S%H816>trespassed.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> to <S%H7725>recompense<s%> the <S%H817>trespass<s%> to, let the <S%H817>trespass<s%> be <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H3725>atonement,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> shall be made for him.

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7126>bring<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> shall be his.
And every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> things shall be his: <S%H834>whatever<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> it shall be his.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>If<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H7847>go<s%> <S%H7847>aside,<s%> and <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against him,

And a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> with her <S%H7902>carnally,<s%> <S%H2233><s%> and it be <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of her <S%H376>husband,<s%> and be <S%H5641>kept<s%> <S%H5641>close,<s%> and she be <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> and there be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against her, <S%H3808>neither<s%> she be <S%H8610>taken<s%> with the manner;

And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> on him, and he be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and she be <S%H2930>defiled:<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> if the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> on him, and he be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and she be not <S%H2930>defiled:<s%>

Then shall the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> her <S%H7133>offering<s%> for her, the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7058>meal;<s%> he shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon;<s%> for it is an <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial,<s%> <S%H2142>bringing<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance.<s%>
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> her <S%H7138>near,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> her <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel;<s%> and of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> that is in the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4325>water:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6544>uncover<s%> the <S%H802>woman's<s%> <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in her <S%H3709>hands,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H4503>offering:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7650>charge<s%> her by an <S%H7650>oath,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H7901>lain<s%> with you, and <S%H518>if<s%> you have not <S%H7847>gone<s%> <S%H7847>aside<s%> to <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> with another <S%H8478>instead<s%> of your <S%H376>husband,<s%> be you <S%H5352>free<s%> from this <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse:<s%>

But <S%H3588>if<s%> you have <S%H7847>gone<s%> <S%H7847>aside<s%> to another <S%H8478>instead<s%> of your <S%H376>husband,<s%> and <S%H3588>if<s%> you be <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> and some <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H5414>lain<s%> <S%H7903><s%> with you <S%H1107>beside<s%> your <S%H376>husband:<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7650>charge<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath<s%> of <S%H423>cursing,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H423>curse<s%> and an <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> does <S%H5414>make<s%> your <S%H3409>thigh<s%> to <S%H5307>rot,<s%> and your <S%H990>belly<s%> to <S%H6639>swell;<s%>

And this <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> into your <S%H4578>bowels,<s%> to make your <S%H990>belly<s%> to <S%H6638>swell,<s%> and your <S%H3409>thigh<s%> to <S%H5307>rot:<s%> And the <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> <S%H543>amen.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H423>curses<s%> in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> and he shall <S%H4229>blot<s%> them out with the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4325>water:<s%>

And he shall cause the <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse:<s%> and the <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into her, and become <S%H4751>bitter.<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H4503>offering<s%> out of the <S%H802>woman's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7126>offer<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7061>take<s%> an <S%H7061>handful<s%> of the <S%H4503>offering,<s%> even the <S%H234>memorial<s%> thereof, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall cause the <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And when he has made her to <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water,<s%> then it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that, <S%H518>if<s%> she be <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> and have done <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against her <S%H376>husband,<s%> that the <S%H4325>water<s%> that causes the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into her, and become <S%H4751>bitter,<s%> and her <S%H990>belly<s%> shall <S%H6638>swell,<s%> and her <S%H3409>thigh<s%> shall <S%H5307>rot:<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> shall be a <S%H423>curse<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> her <S%H5971>people.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> be not <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> but be <S%H2889>clean;<s%> then she shall be <S%H5352>free,<s%> and shall <S%H2232>conceive<s%> <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousies,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H7847>goes<s%> <S%H7847>aside<s%> to another <S%H8478>instead<s%> of her <S%H376>husband,<s%> and is <S%H2930>defiled;<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>comes<s%> on him, and he be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> over his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> on her <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law.<s%>
Then shall the <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H5352>guiltless<s%> from <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> her <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
